price: 88. Kuwa gaalooba oo ka hor istaaga dadka Jidka Alle (Islaamka), waxaan ugu dari cadaab cadaabkooda, waxay fasaad fali jireen awgii.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ زِدۡنَٰهُمۡ عَذَابٗا فَوۡقَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ بِمَا كَانُواْ يُفۡسِدُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna kafarū waṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi zid'nāhum ʿadhāban fawqa al-ʿadhābi bimā kānū yuf'sidūna
